sentences.en: He accused them of conniving with foreign companies to weaken employment rights.
sentences.cn: 他指控他们与外国公司共谋来削弱雇用权。

sentences.en: Not to protest is to connive at the destruction of the environment.
sentences.cn: 对于破坏环境的行为不加反对就等于纵容.

sentences.en: The prisoners paid the guards to connive at their escape.
sentences.cn: 囚犯们贿赂看守,使看守默许他们越狱.

sentences.en: They connived with their mother to deceive me.
sentences.cn: 他们与他们的母亲串通来骗我。

words.tran_cn: 纵容；默许；假装不见；共谋（connive的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 默许, 纵容, 暗中合作, 密谋策划
trans.tran_en: to not try to stop something wrong from happening
